sqlMap.select: select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07

select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07 WHERE SM_ID=#id#

select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07 WHERE SMMESINFO=#mes_informacion#

select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07 WHERE TRIM(SMRUNBENEF) = #run_beneficiario#

select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07 where SM_ID >= #keyFin# order by SM_ID FETCH FIRST $paginacion$ ROWS ONLY

select SM_ID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMMESINFO,'')) as SMMESINFO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODENTID,0)) as SMCODENTID, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNROLICEN,'')) as SMNROLICEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNBENEF,'')) as SMRUNBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMBENEF,'')) as SMNOMBENEF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMEDAD,0)) as SMEDAD, TRIM(IFNULL(SMSEXO,'')) as SMSEXO, CASE WHEN SMFECEMLIC IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECEMLIC = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECEMLIC,ISO) END AS SMFECEMLIC_C, SMFECEMLIC, CASE WHEN SMFECINIRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECINIRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECINIRE,ISO) END AS SMFECINIRE_C, SMFECINIRE, CASE WHEN SMFECTERRE IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECTERRE = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECTERRE,ISO) END AS SMFECTERRE_C, SMFECTERRE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNRODIALI,0)) as SMNRODIALI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNUMDIAU,0)) as SMNUMDIAU, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNMENEN,'')) as SMRUNMENEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMMENEN,'')) as SMNOMMENEN, CASE WHEN SMFECNAMEN IS NULL THEN '' WHEN SMFECNAMEN = DATE ('0001-01-01') THEN '' ELSE CHAR(SMFECNAMEN,ISO) END AS SMFECNAMEN_C, SMFECNAMEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODTIPLI,0)) as SMCODTIPLI, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODCOBEN,'')) as SMCODCOBEN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUNPROF,'')) as SMRUNPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMPROF,'')) as SMNOMPROF, TRIM(IFNULL(SMREGCOPRO,'')) as SMREGCOPRO, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCODDIAGN,'')) as SMCODDIAGN, TRIM(IFNULL(SMRUTEMPLE,'')) as SMRUTEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMNOMEMPLE,'')) as SMNOMEMPLE, TRIM(IFNULL(SMCALITRAB,0)) as SMCALITRAB from SIMATDTA.SMF07 where SM_ID >= #keyInicio# order by SM_ID FETCH FIRST $paginacion$ ROWS ONLY
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SIMATDTA.SMF07 (SM_ID,SMMESINFO,SMCODENTID,SMNROLICEN,SMRUNBENEF,SMNOMBENEF,SMEDAD,SMSEXO,SMFECEMLIC,SMFECINIRE,SMFECTERRE,SMNRODIALI,SMNUMDIAU,SMRUNMENEN,SMNOMMENEN,SMFECNAMEN,SMCODTIPLI,SMCODCOBEN,SMRUNPROF,SMNOMPROF,SMREGCOPRO,SMCODDIAGN,SMRUTEMPLE,SMNOMEMPLE,SMCALITRAB) VALUES (IFNULL((select max(SM_ID)+1 from SIMATDTA.SMF07),0),#mes_informacion#,#codigo_entidad#,#nro_licencia#,#run_beneficiario#,#nombre_beneficiario#,#edad#,#sexo#,#fecha_emision_licencia#,#fecha_inicio_reposo#,#fecha_termino_reposo#,#nro_dias_licencia#,#num_dias_licencia_autorizados#,#run_menor_enfermo#,#nombre_menor_enfermo#,#fecha_nac_menor_enfermo#,#cod_tipo_licencia#,#cod_comuna_beneficiario#,#run_profesional#,#nombre_profesional#,#registro_colegio_profesional#,#codigo_diagnostico#,#rut_empleador#,#nombre_empleador#,#calidad_trabajador#) WITH NC
sqlMap.delete: delete from SIMATDTA.SMF07 where SM_ID=#id# WITH NC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SIMATDTA.SMF07 SET SMMESINFO=#mes_informacion#, SMCODENTID=#codigo_entidad#, SMNROLICEN=#nro_licencia#, SMRUNBENEF=#run_beneficiario#, SMNOMBENEF=#nombre_beneficiario#, SMEDAD=#edad#, SMSEXO=#sexo#, SMFECEMLIC=#fecha_emision_licencia#, SMFECINIRE=#fecha_inicio_reposo#, SMFECTERRE=#fecha_termino_reposo#, SMNRODIALI=#nro_dias_licencia#, SMNUMDIAU=#num_dias_licencia_autorizados#, SMRUNMENEN=#run_menor_enfermo#, SMNOMMENEN=#nombre_menor_enfermo#, SMFECNAMEN=#fecha_nac_menor_enfermo#, SMCODTIPLI=#cod_tipo_licencia#, SMCODCOBEN=#cod_comuna_beneficiario#, SMRUNPROF=#run_profesional#, SMNOMPROF=#nombre_profesional#, SMREGCOPRO=#registro_colegio_profesional#, SMCODDIAGN=#codigo_diagnostico#, SMRUTEMPLE=#rut_empleador#, SMNOMEMPLE=#nombre_empleador#, SMCALITRAB=#calidad_trabajador# WHERE SM_ID=#id# WITH NC
